alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; North Phoenix, Glendale (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 11:53PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 1230 AM MST... At 1153 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tolleson, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Avondale, Goodyear, Tolleson, Cashion, Litchfield Park, Phoenix International Raceway, Perryville and Camelback Ranch. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 119 and 139. AZ Route 101 between mile markers 2 and 5. AZ Route 303 between mile markers 105 and 106. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
